title: Introducing: Soft Lighting
body: **Ernest Greene** wishes that he’d written this song (actually, he does have a song called [_Far Away_](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=neUXnTzAR9o).). From the lush melodies, to the desperately infectious synths, **Soft Lighting’s** debut track _Far Away_ cements them as a one to watch in 2012. Sure, the dream-pop genre is fairly overcrowded at the moment, but with more tracks to the quality of _Far Away_, and this Kansas City group are sure to stand out. All lazy **Washed Out** comparisons aside, the languid, shoegaze-esque drawl that _Far Away_ possess makes it’s a simply sublime listen. Stream it below.
